item.title: SSH Key Authentication Overview
item.description: For those of you new to automation, Linux, and SSH keypairs: Calm Marketplace blueprints leverage all of these with cloud-init to enable security best-practices, but it can be overwhelming on first exposure to handle every link in the chain to launch your first blueprint.
